isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CUMMINS M11E AND N14E - OPERATION - Diagnostic On/Off Switch (83)

svcproc.title: Diagnostic On/Off Switch (83)
svcproc.para: The diagnostic switch (83) is an On/Off switch used to perform on-board diagnostics. Also refer to TROUBLESHOOTINGcharts.

With the key switch on and the engine not cranking or running, when the diagnostic On/Off switch is moved to the on position, the switch contact closes and a ground path is applied to the ECM through the 21-way interface connector (312) at terminal V. From this terminal the path is circuit 97AM, connector (3), circuit 97AM, the diagnostic On/Off switch (83), circuit 97-GE/97-GA, connector (3), and circuit 97-GA/97-G to the ECM (320) common ground terminal 10. This tells the ECM that the diagnostics On/Off switch has been moved to the on position.
